duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide patient service support and assistance in a healthcare environment, demonstrating strong communication skills and empathy.
Utilize critical thinking to prioritize patient needs and inquiries, navigating insurance, reimbursement, and co-pay programs.
Effectively demonstrate the ability to navigate computer systems such as CRM and balance multiple priorities.
Operate fax machines, computer software, and telephone technology to support patient service processes.
Demonstrate therapeutic area knowledge when interacting with patients and healthcare professionals.

education_certification.credential: BA/BS degree required in Healthcare, Nursing, Social Work, Pharmacy, or related fields
